extendedInfo.description: Cortado Workplace offers a free cloud desktop with 2 GB of online storage, mobile printing and more for every type of device. Access your files from anywhere at any time, move them between different devices and print them via Wi-Fi. Thanks to Cortado Workplace, you can work on the go just as on your desktop computer. Cortado Workplace includes 2 GB of online storage for free (which you can increase at any time). ADVANTAGES:â¢ Stay flexible: With Cortado Workplaceâs online storage, access your documents and other files at any time with your smartphone, tablet, PC or Macâ¢ Complete mobility: View, edit and print your documents on the go â¢ Complements Android devices: Cortado Workplace combines local Android resources with cloud desktop functions adapted for your Android deviceFEATURES FOR ANDROID:â¢ Access your files in the Workplace online storage anytime, anywhereâ¢ Manage files with traditional file handling features such as copy, paste and deleteâ¢ Open and edit documents in other programs such as Quickoffice or Documents To Goâ¢ Save documents from other programs to your Cortado Workplace online storage (no upload limit) â¢ Use the cloud printing feature to print your documents to nearly every printer â  no need to even turn on the computerâ¢ Web Capture: Save websites locally on your smartphone and read, edit or print them offline USE CORTADO WORKPLACE WITH A MAC OR PC: â¢ Via the Cortado HTML5 client, easily access your files in the cloud from a web browser, without needing to install any additional software or plug-ins. Content can therefore be conveniently uploaded and managed, documents displayed as a data-optimized file preview, exported as PDF or forwarded via e-mail. (Requires an HTML5 desktop browser such as Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Google Chrome or Internet Explorer 9.)â¢ Connect your Cortado Workplace online storage as a cloud-drive to your PC. Then, easily access your Cortado Workplace account using your file explorer, copy documents via drag and drop between different drives and save them directly to Cortado Workplace.MORE INFORMATION:Not a Google Play user? Try this link: www.cortado.com/android-app View a short video about Cortado Workplace at: workplace.cortado.com/featuresView the quickquide on our website: workplace.cortado.com/help/forandroidVirtually any major file format is compatible with Cortado Workplace. Just save files in your online storage, edit them or print websites, photos, PDF, XLS, XLSX, DOC, DOCX, PPT, JPG, PNG, GIF, TIFF and many more formats seamlessly. Printing via Wi-Fi with your Android device supports printers from leading manufacturers such as Samsung, Sharp, Toshiba, HP, Lexmark, Canon, Brother, Epson, Lenovo and many more. For more information about cloud printing and supported printers visit www.cloud-printing-alliance.com

reviews.title: Would be great but not for my printer
reviews.comment: Very easy to set up for wifi printing: automatically scanned and found my printer, but does not offer setup for Canon MX340 series printer. Please fix this and I will upgrade my rating as it seems very simple and logical to use and I have been searching for an app like this for so long!
reviews.author: Sarah Jones

reviews.title: I can print from my HTC one!
reviews.comment: I had to enter the networked printers IP address in manually. However,  that\'s easy to do by just going to your pc and clicking start,  settings, printers properties, then finding  the port number (IP number).
reviews.author: Rick Paguirigan

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1
reviews.comment: Does well for printing but have to do too many steps and print function is clunky.
reviews.author: Stephen Abrew

reviews.title: GS3/ HP Photosmart B110 Series.
reviews.comment: Seems good so far, I found the IP address of my printer by printing out a Status Report, hooked it up. The added bonus is I can update as I go. Trail by fire winner.
reviews.author: James Walley

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Prints documents on my HP C309g printer from my Samsung galaxy tab 7.7 sometimes you have to work around different documents by sending them to adobe reader first. So if you don\'t mind playing with it a little but it works great. Thanks for this great work around. Now I don\'t have to buy a Samsung printer for my tablet to print documents for work. Worked for me on wifi and blue tooth.
reviews.author: Barry J Kovarik

reviews.title: 3 yrs I\'ve been looking for this
reviews.comment: Brother MFC-885 CW printer. I have trying to print from my Android to this particular printer for over 3 years. In a matter of 30 seconds after installing I was printing. No other app has the driver to accomplish this. So estatic!!! I\'m printing away for free!!!!! Thank you.
reviews.author: Da Ha

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Works on my brother printer when the brother appl\303\254cation didn\'t.
reviews.author: David Dohm

reviews.title: It\'s a yes
reviews.comment: This printed to an older kodak. I\'ll be using as my FREE document wifi printer program. It\'s got a lot to offer.
reviews.author: Bruce L.

reviews.title: Pretty Good!
reviews.comment: Only problem so far is that I have to set my printer\'s IP manually - it is seen and identified, but attempts to print a test page fail. Printer is a Brother HL2270DW, connecting via wireless.
reviews.author: James Pratt

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Crashes every time I try to start it use to work now its broken
reviews.author: Jeff Blount

reviews.comment: Sweet app! Think ill be using a lot of this!
reviews.author: Sean Burgess

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Finally, I can print directly to my network attached Brother printer.
reviews.author: Rick Christenson

reviews.comment: Recommend did exactly what it said only that will conect to my printer
reviews.author: dave burrow

reviews.title: Always \'Loading\'
reviews.comment: Won\'t work with my Wi-Fi Canon MX870
reviews.author: Michael Perone

reviews.title: Does not work with my canon mg5200 wifi printer.
reviews.comment: Please could you fix this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a very good app.highly recommende.
reviews.author: Rick Ho

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Works great!

reviews.title: Easy install
reviews.comment: Found both my Dell and Brother printers with no problems
reviews.author: Michael Richards

reviews.title: Easy to Setup
reviews.comment: Easy to setup. Not so eady to import my documents from my Google drive. Still trying to figure this out. I will come back later and provide a more in detailed description of my experience.
reviews.author: Wendy Brown

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Thanks
